name: start_chat_with_number
description: Start a new chat with a specific phone number.
parameters: {"phone_number": "What is the phone number you want to start a chat with?"}
example: {"instruction": "Reply to 123456 with message: Goodbye", "screen": "

name: select_conversation
description: Select a conversation to open it.
parameters: "{'contact_name': 'Which contact\\'s conversation do you want to open? [\"Amy\", \"Bob\"]'}"
example: {"instruction": "Resend the message I just sent to Amy in messages.", "screen": "

name: start_new_chat
description: Start a new chat or conversation.
example: {"instruction": "Send a text message using Messages to 123456 with message: OK.", "screen": "

name: start_chat_with_contact
description: Start a new chat with a specific contact name.
parameters: {"contact_name": "What is the name of the contact you want to start a chat with?"}
example: {"instruction": "\u7ed9\u4e50\u4e50\u53d1\u77ed\u4fe1\u8bf4\uff1a\u4f60\u597d\u3002", "screen": "

name: start_chat_with_custom_number
description: Start a new chat with a custom phone number that is not listed in the contacts.
parameters: {"phone_number": "What is the phone number you want to start a chat with?", "message": "What message do you want to send?"}
example:
{"instruction": "\u7ed9\u53f7\u7801123\u53d1\u77ed\u4fe1\u8bf4\uff1a\u4f60\u597d\u3002", "screen": "
", "response": {"reasoning": "The user wants to send a message to the number '123' with the content '\u4f60\u597d'. name: create_new_contact
description: Create a new contact with a specific name and phone number.
parameters: {"contact_name": "What is the name of the contact you want to create?", "phone_number": "What is the phone number for the new contact?"}
example: {"instruction": "\u521b\u5efa\u4e00\u4e2a\u65b0\u7684\u8054\u7cfb\u4eba\uff0c\u540d\u5b57\u4e3a\u4e50\u4e50\uff0c\u53f7\u7801\u4e3a6666\u3002\u7136\u540e\u7ed9\u5f20\u4e09\u53d1\u77ed\u4fe1\u8bf4\uff1a\u4f60\u597d\u3002", "screen": "
